New York Post – by Yaron Steinbuch

The Chinese military has received the green light to use a coronavirus vaccine developed by its research unit and a biotech company, according to a report.

The Central Military Commission approved the use of the Ad5-nCoV vaccine candidate on Thursday for a period of one year, CanSino Biologics said in a filing, Reuters reported. Continue reading “China’s military approves coronavirus vaccine for use on soldiers”
